competitors.name: College Hunks Hauling Junk
competitors.weakness: Expensive, franchise model, no AI, no tech differentiation

competitors.name: 1-800-GOT-JUNK
competitors.weakness: Single service, phone-based quoting, no photo quotes

competitors.name: Craigslist Independents
competitors.weakness: No vetting, no insurance verification, no tracking, trust issues

competitors.name: Angi (formerly Angie's List)
competitors.weakness: Lead gen model — pros pay for leads, customers get spammed. Can't choose your pro.

competitors.name: TaskRabbit
competitors.weakness: Gig workers not trade pros, limited service depth, no B2B

competitors.name: Thumbtack
competitors.weakness: Lead gen, pros pay per lead, high cost of acquisition for pros

channels.name: Lake Nona Social
channels.strategy: Join and monitor for home service requests. Respond helpfully. Post seasonal tips (hurricane prep, pool maintenance). DO NOT spam.

channels.name: Lake Nona Neighbors
channels.strategy: Same as above. Watch for 'anyone know a good [service]?' posts — that's your opening.

channels.name: Lake Nona Moms
channels.strategy: Home service recs come up often in mom groups. Be helpful, not salesy.

channels.name: Orlando Home Services / Contractors
channels.url: search Facebook for Orlando contractor groups
channels.strategy: Pro recruitment. Post about earning opportunities, fee structure, certifications.

channels.name: Orlando Property Managers Network
channels.strategy: B2B lead gen. Connect with PMs, offer free pilot.

channels.name: Nextdoor — Lake Nona
channels.strategy: Create business page. Respond to service recommendation requests. Neighbors trust Nextdoor recs more than Google.

channels.name: r/orlando
channels.strategy: Monitor for home service recommendation threads. Respond genuinely with helpful advice + mention UpTend when relevant.

channels.name: r/HomeImprovement
channels.strategy: Content marketing — post Orlando-specific home maintenance guides linking back to uptendapp.com

channels.name: Orlando Craigslist — Services
channels.strategy: DUAL: (1) Find pros advertising services → recruit them. (2) Post UpTend pro opportunities in gigs/labor.

channels.name: Google My Business
channels.strategy: Claim UpTend listing. Post weekly updates. Respond to all reviews. Target 'home services lake nona' local pack.

channels.name: Yelp Orlando
channels.strategy: Claim listing. Monitor competitor reviews for pain points (late, overcharged, no-show) — use in marketing.
